title: doc/asm: should reference local copy of http://plan9.bell-labs.com/sys/doc/asm.html
body:
https://golang.org/doc/asm currently says:

"The assembler is based on the input to the Plan 9 assemblers, which is documented
in detail on the Plan 9 site." with a link to
http://plan9.bell-labs.com/sys/doc/asm.html

This site appears to be down when I attempt to visit it.  The documentation should
probably provide a local copy of that doc, or document Go's assembly directly.
